markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Disrupt Ki](/Feats.aspx?ID=469) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
<trait label="Negative" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=118" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 163 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Make an unarmed Strike. If it deals damage to a living creature, you block that creature’s inner life force. The creature takes 2d6 persistent negative damage and is enfeebled 1 until the persistent damage ends. If you’re 18th level or higher, this deals 3d6 persistent negative damage instead.
name: Disrupt Ki

<traits>

---

<summary>
Your strike can block a creature's inner life force.
</summary>
summary: Your strike can block a creature's inner life force.
summary_markdown: Your strike can block a creature's inner life force.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 12" pfs="Standard" > Disrupt Ki Two Actions Source Core Rulebook pg. 163 4.0 --- Make an unarmed Strike. If it deals damage to a living creature, you block that creature’s inner life force. The creature takes 2d6 persistent negative damage and is enfeebled 1 until the persistent damage ends. If you’re 18th level or higher, this deals 3d6 persistent negative damage instead.
